conference.title: PHP Day Curitiba 2018
conference.summary: PHP Day Curitiba is an annual conference that has been shaking up the community of Paraná state, in southern Brazil. It'll be a single and full day of networking, learning, sharing, and great fun!
conference.content:
PHP Day Curitiba is an annual conference that has been shaking up the community of Paraná state, in southern Brazil. It'll be a single and full day of networking, learning, sharing, and great fun!
- +120 attendees - 7 High quality talks - 2 Keynote Speakers - Free Admission + Coffee-break + A lot of networking
Save the date: **Saturday, October 6th.**
<http://www.phpdaycuritiba.com.br>
